dt.t: a thin salt-and-pepper moustache interrupted by a {wi}generous{/wi} nose

dt: {bc}characterized by a noble or kindly spirit {bc}{sx|magnanimous||}, {sx|kindly||}

pt: {sc}liberal{/sc} {sc}generous{/sc} {sc}bountiful{/sc} {sc}munificent{/sc} mean giving or given freely and unstintingly. {sc}liberal{/sc} suggests openhandedness in the giver and largeness in the thing or amount given.
{sc}generous{/sc} stresses warmhearted readiness to give more than size or importance of the gift.
{sc}bountiful{/sc} suggests lavish, unremitting giving or providing.
{sc}munificent{/sc} suggests a scale of giving appropriate to lords or princes.

et: Middle French or Latin; Middle French {it}genereus{/it}, from Latin {it}generosus{/it}, from {it}gener-, genus{/it}
shortdef: marked by abundance or ample proportions : copious
characterized by a noble or kindly spirit : magnanimous, kindly
